name: Zeus vs Monsters - Math Game
description:
Zeus vs Monsters is a fun educational game for kids. It offers 50 levels of math exercise and problems to be solved in an easy, normal or hard way. Players can choose between Zeus and Athena as the main characters and attempt to solve math problems in order to save the characters. In addition, players will be able to learn a bit about Greek mythology as at every fifth level a mythological creature appears.

The game is fast paced and very dynamic. It covers the basic math operations of addition, subtraction, multiplication and division and it offers a section for educators where teachers or parents can follow the progress a player has made. Zeus vs Monsters is one of those games which shows that learning math can be lots of fun.

To let us know what you think about the game, give suggestions or ask questions, please contact us: http://www.peaksel.com/
